description: This file is a shell script used for network connectivity self-healing tests, including ping and DNS resolution checks, with mechanisms to reboot the device if tests fail and corrective actions are needed.

methods.name: getCorrectiveActionState
methods.description: Retrieves the current corrective action state from syscfg.

methods.name: calcRandTimetoStartPing
methods.description: Calculates a random delay time before starting the ping tests.

methods.name: resetRouter
methods.description: Reboots the router device by invoking the device management CLI.

methods.name: resetNeeded
methods.description: Checks if the process requires a reset and performs it if necessary.

methods.name: runDNSPingTest
methods.description: Performs a DNS ping test, including URL resolution and corrective action if DNS fails.

methods.name: runPingTest
methods.description: Performs a ping test to the default gateway and triggers a reset if the ping fails.
